%vlocity_namespace%__PropertySet__c.completeMessage: Are you sure you want to complete the script?
%vlocity_namespace%__PropertySet__c.instruction:
1. Keep this step disabled.  It is intended to provide context around how this prototype is configured.
  2. In some cases, additional notes specific to a component can be found in the "Internal Notes" section of a component.
  3. Salesforce Data:  Created Account for Canada Life.  Created 3 Contacts associated to that Account for Group Emails.
  4. Salesforce Custom Field:  Created a SubType__c field on Case
  5. Salesforce Data:  Sample Types & SubTypes were used in the dev org and conditional logic configured related to those.  Those were not added to the CL sbox.  We will add the CL specified Types & SubTypes and update the conditional logic once those are available.
  6. Contact Record Id for external email is defaulted in the prototype.  This should be configured to the the contactId pulled from the PrototypeGetContact DR.  I have yet to configure my contacts to be associated to users, which is the case in the CL org.
  7. If the internal emails end up using the same template, then we can go to a single Email action for the internal emails with a formula or set values that disctates the recipient group email inbox.  
  8. Pending reciept of APIs needed, the prototype uses a set values (MimicAPIValues) to mimic the data coming back from a CL API call.
  9. Currently the case is closed upon creation.   Future iterations may evolve from that, pending when/if CL team members will start working these cases in SF.  At that time, the internal email actions can be removed.
  10. ToDo:  Attach uploaded documents to email. If desired.
  11. ToDo:  Multi-language (EN,FR)
  12. ToDo:  Dev UI work
  13. ToDo:  Create CL Specific Email templates.  OOB SupportCaseCreatedWebInquiries template used as placeholder for prototype. Noting that external email will have the email HTML in the configured Body section of the Email Action.
  14. Design Choice:  IPs were not used, but can be considered to consolidate/orchestrate DR Actions and HTTP Actions.
  15. Design Choice:  Post Attachments and Post Case were created as separate DRs to demonstrate them as autonomous units.  They can be combined.
  16. PrototypeMessagingFunction Step added to give sample of using Messaging function.  It is not specifically related to this prototype.  Enable the step to see messaging funtion works.
%vlocity_namespace%__PropertySet__c.label: Prototype Description
%vlocity_namespace%__PropertySet__c.saveMessage: Are you sure you want to save it for later?
